text: avaraviṭe vacc iṅṅane alamuṟayiṭuṁ: "ñaṅṅaḷuṭe nāthā, ñaṅṅaḷeyeānn puṟattayakkēṇamē. ñaṅṅaḷ mump ceytirunnatil ninn vyatyastamāyi nalla kāryaṅṅaḷ ceytukeāḷḷāṁ." allāhu paṟayuṁ: "pāṭhamuḷkkeāḷḷunnavarkk atuḷkkeāḷḷān mātraṁ nāṁ āyus's nalkiyirunnillē? niṅṅaḷuṭeyaṭutt munnaṟiyippukāran vanniṭṭumuṇṭāyirunnillē? atinālini anubhaviccukeāḷḷuka. akramikaḷkkiviṭe sahāyiyāyi ārumilla
